name: Kitty Kite
description:
You control a faithful dog (with arrow keys or WASD) running around and avoiding obstacles with a kitty kite attached to your collar. Only the kite can bump into the clouds and retrieve its bows but it is buffeted by the wind. Keep an eye on the trail of bows to see which way the wind will soon blow. You have one full day to create the best kite tail a good doggo can make!

Made for Train Jam 2019 in 72 hours from Chicago to San Francisco!
